post.desc:
I mean, I guess "**PwH**" is supposed to stand for "**P**rismriver **w**ith **H**orikawa" ??? Like, can't name actual names kind of situation, so use an abbreviation people will pick up anyway?

***

Of course, it's a [**Pixiv article**](https://dic.pixiv.net/a/ホリズムリバー楽団)...

Oh? It seems ZUN himself confirmed they switched from "**Horismriver**" to "**Prismriver with H**" because those three didn't like the name that Raiko just chose by herself without their input.
